title: Add SSE/HTTP transport for MCP server
description: Currently the MCP server only supports stdio transport, requiring the AI client to spawn the process as a subprocess. Add SSE/HTTP transport option so the MCP server can run as an endpoint on the web server (e.g. /mcp), enabling remote AI clients to connect without needing local access to the binary or database. This would make Docker deployments much simpler for MCP integration.
